Package game.reset

Interface Resettable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Coin, Enemy, Goomba, Koopa, Mature, Player, Sapling, Sprout, Tree
public interface Resettable
This class represents the interface to be implemented by all objects that are intended to be resetted

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void registerInstance()
    a default interface method that register current instance to the Singleton manager.
    void resetInstance()
    Allows any classes that use this interface to reset abilities, attributes, and/or items.

  • Method Details

    • resetInstance

      void resetInstance()
      Allows any classes that use this interface to reset abilities, attributes, and/or items. HINT: play around with capability, the actual implementation happens in the tick or playTurn method.

    • registerInstance

      default void registerInstance()
      a default interface method that register current instance to the Singleton manager. It allows corresponding class uses to be affected by global reset
